definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: It was a stopping point on the famous Silk Road between the East and the West .
sentences.chinese: 當時它是連接東西方的著名絲綢之路上的一個歇腳點。

sentences.english: Lu Lu pattern (six black keys and six white keys) keyboard is the outcome of the syncretism of Eastern and Western civilizations.
sentences.chinese: “律呂式鍵盤”是東西方文明交匯融合的產物。

sentences.english: Ran Road, East-West differences, you really so great?
sentences.chinese: 然道，東西方的差異，真的如此巨大麼？

sentences.english: Maybe west and east should calm down and look at themselves.
sentences.chinese: 也許東西方國家應冷靜下來，反思一下。

sentences.english: There are many stories of transfiguration at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 東西方許多民族，都有關於變形題材的故事。

sentences.english: Her work, though, goes beyond the cultural fetishes of an East-West comparison.
sentences.chinese: 她的作品，雖然，在東西方信仰文化之間的比較下。

sentences.english: Promise confidentiality until the executive has reviewed and concurred with your write-up.
sentences.chinese: 直至主管審覈並同意你所寫的東西方承諾保守祕密。

sentences.english: First, the Cold War split the membership along East-West lines.
sentences.chinese: 首先，冷戰以東西方劃線將成員國分裂成兩大陣營。

sentences.english: The cultural development of the East and West forms different viewpoints on human rights.
sentences.chinese: 東西方文化發展造就了不同的人權觀。

sentences.english: Li noted the differences in thinking between East and West.
sentences.chinese: 李宏則提到了東西方在思考方式上的差異。

sentences.english: Is it east verse west, or man against man?
sentences.chinese: 是東西方對決抑是人與人的爭鬥？

sentences.english: It was present in primitive societies both in the east and the west.
sentences.chinese: 東西方都早在原始社會就使用了勺子。

sentences.english: "1 And his paintings are reputed to be "the cultural bridge between East and West".
sentences.chinese: 陳逸飛的畫作更被譽爲東西方的文化橋樑。

sentences.english: The world-renowned Silk Road is a series of routes connecting the East and the West.
sentences.chinese: 聞名於世的絲綢之路是一系列連接東西方的路線。

sentences.english: Since the East and West Germanies were unified they are a political entity .
sentences.chinese: 德國東西方統一後就是一個統一的政治實體了。

sentences.english: Even if looking at the same rock and tree, the comprehension of eastern and western people will be totally different.
sentences.chinese: 即使對於一石一木的理解，東西方也是不盡相同。

definition: to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
